Ụlọ ọrụ nyocha ihe mberede (AIB) na-enyocha ihe mberede ụgbọelu na ihe omume na Naịjirịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport na Abuja.
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-agwa Onye isi ala Naịjirịa site na Minista Federal nke Aviation
Kọmishọna ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, onye bụkwa Chief Executive Officer bụ Engr
Na Septemba, na afọ 2020, Federal Executive Council kwadoro nguzobe nke AIB Training School na Naịjirịa.
N'oge gara aga, Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ụgbọelu na-enyocha ihe mgberede ụgbọelu
N'afọ 1989, e guzobere Federal Civil Aviation Authority (FCAA), na Ngalaba Civil Aviation nke MOA ghọrọ Ngalaba FCAA nke Ọrụ Nchebe
N'otu afọ ahụ, e guzobere Ụlọ Ọrụ Nnyocha Ihe Ọghọm (AIB), nke dị n'okpuru Ministrị nke Ụgbọelu, na FCAA enweghịzi ọrụ nyocha ihe mberede
E mechara gbanwee aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Ụlọ Ọrụ Nnyocha na Mgbochi Ihe Ọghọm
Dị ka akụkụ nke Civil Aviation Act nke afọ 2006, AIB ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ na-achị onwe ya ma nye ya aha ọzọ Accident Investigation Bureau.
